[{"id":"JT-46974","entityId":"25-1970012","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46974"},{"name":"summary","value":"Incorrect messages on trying to set empty value to required field"},{"name":"description","value":"

buid 41221

STR:
Go to some issue and try to set empty value to different types of fields

ER:
Message like "Field X cannot be empty"

AR:
For multivalue fields: "Issue AAA-6 has empty value for field Affected versions"
For date fields: "Incompatible value format for type date"
For period/integer/float/string: no message at all (JT-46971)
